name: Walmart Inc.
summary: Walmart Inc. is the worldâ€™s largest retailer and private employer, operating a global chain of hypermarkets, discount department stores, and grocery stores. Founded in 1962 and headquartered in Bentonville, Arkansas, Walmart serves hundreds of millions of customers weekly through more than 10,750 stores and e-commerce sites in 19 countries. The company is publicly traded (NYSE: WMT), consistently ranks #1 on the Fortune 500, and is recognized for its scale, supply chain efficiency, and commitment to offering everyday low prices.
